posts.title: What is HTML?
posts.body: HTML stands for HyperText Markup Language. It is used to create the structure of web pages.

posts.title: What is CSS?
posts.body: CSS is used to style HTML elements. It changes colors, sizes, and layout of web pages.

posts.title: JavaScript Basics
posts.body: JavaScript makes web pages interactive. For example, clicking a button or showing a popup.

posts.title: What is a Website?
posts.body: A website is a collection of web pages that you can visit using a browser like Chrome or Firefox.

posts.title: What is a Computer Program?
posts.body: A program is a set of instructions that a computer follows to do a task, like a calculator app.
